name: Blighted Agent
oracle_text:
Infect (This creature deals damage to creatures in the form of -1/-1 counters and to players in the form of poison counters.)
Blighted Agent can't be blocked.
flavor_text:
"Urabrask may suspect our surveillance, but he cannot stop it."
—Avaricta, Gitaxian sective

name: Boreal Druid
oracle_text: {T}: Add {C}.
flavor_text: Some creatures are bound to the cold by Rimewind magic. Others seek it out, adapted by two thousand years of the Ice. The Boreal, where Heidar's frigid sway is strongest, is home to both.

name: Burning Inquiry
oracle_text: Each player draws three cards, then discards three cards at random.
flavor_text: Jariad burned the midnight oil, burned through scroll after scroll, and then burned down his laboratory.

name: Chimney Imp
oracle_text:
Flying
When Chimney Imp dies, target opponent puts a card from their hand on top of their library.

name: Echoing Decay
oracle_text: Target creature and all other creatures with the same name as that creature get -2/-2 until end of turn.
flavor_text: A single fear unleashes a torrent of nightmares.

name: Game-Trail Changeling
oracle_text:
Changeling (This card is every creature type.)
Trample
flavor_text:
"I pity them, never knowing the pleasures of a single familiar form, but at least they find a noble shape at times."
—Desmera, perfect of Wren's Run

name: Gleeful Sabotage
oracle_text:
Destroy target artifact or enchantment.
Conspire (As you cast this spell, you may tap two untapped creatures you control that share a color with it. When you do, copy it and you may choose a new target for the copy.)

name: Goblin Bushwhacker
oracle_text:
Kicker {R} (You may pay an additional {R} as you cast this spell.)
When Goblin Bushwhacker enters the battlefield, if it was kicked, creatures you control get +1/+0 and gain haste until end of turn.

name: Greater Mossdog
oracle_text: Dredge 3 (If you would draw a card, you may mill three cards instead. If you do, return this card from your graveyard to your hand.)

name: Hornet Sting
oracle_text: Hornet Sting deals 1 damage to any target.
flavor_text: It was only then—to his infinite sorrow—that Gork realized hornets don't make honey.

name: Iron Myr
oracle_text: {T}: Add {R}.
flavor_text: The myr are like rusted metal: gleaming purpose hidden by a thin disguise of debris.

name: Lapse of Certainty
oracle_text: Counter target spell. If that spell is countered this way, put it on top of its owner's library instead of into that player's graveyard.
flavor_text: Without a connection of mind and body, magic is just an idea stuck in the head, a word on the tip of a tongue.

name: Lumithread Field
oracle_text:
Creatures you control get +0/+1.
Morph {1}{W} (You may cast this card face down as a 2/2 creature for {3}. Turn it face up any time for its morph cost.)
flavor_text: Having conquered the Bastion of Suns, the Ota took its light for their own.

name: Noggle Bandit
oracle_text: Noggle Bandit can't be blocked except by creatures with defender.
flavor_text: Noggles believe that they were the first race ever to walk Shadowmoor. They don't "steal." They just take back what's rightfully theirs.

name: Ogre Gatecrasher
oracle_text: When Ogre Gatecrasher enters the battlefield, destroy target creature with defender.
flavor_text: A popular game among ogres is to see how many revolutions a head can make before it pops off.

name: Pili-Pala
oracle_text:
Flying
{2}, {Q}: Add one mana of any color. ({Q} is the untap symbol.)
flavor_text: It wasn't really expected to fly. Then again, it wasn't expected to move, either.

name: Pyretic Ritual
oracle_text: Add {R}{R}{R}.
flavor_text: The Multiverse is filled with limitless power just waiting for someone to reach out and seize it.

name: Sakura-Tribe Scout
oracle_text: {T}: You may put a land card from your hand onto the battlefield.
flavor_text:
"Scouts of the Sakura Tribe spent two years wandering the forest to learn every leaf and tree. That knowledge was called upon during the Kami War to ensure the orochi's survival."
—*The History of Kamigawa*

name: Sinew Sliver
oracle_text: All Sliver creatures get +1/+1.
flavor_text: As the muscle cords of the creature twitched, Hanna saw an unsettling unanimity in the others' rippling flesh. She didn't know what it meant, but she urged Sisay to keep the ship at a safe distance.

name: Soul's Attendant
oracle_text: Whenever another creature enters the battlefield, you may gain 1 life.
flavor_text: In truth, her own faith was gone, trodden in Ulamog's wake. She pantomimed the blessing in the hope that it would inspire others to continue to struggle.

name: Storm Crow
oracle_text: Flying (This creature can't be blocked except by creatures with flying or reach.)
flavor_text: Storm crow descending, winter unending. Storm crow departing, summer is starting.

name: Viscera Seer
oracle_text: Sacrifice a creature: Scry 1. (Look at the top card of your library. You may put that card on the bottom of your library.)
flavor_text: In matters of life and death, he trusts his gut.
